column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After boarding my plane and placing the luggage in the luggage compartment overhead , I took my seat in my coach section of the airplane .
#text=I luckily had the window seat , meaning I had slightly more room than the two strangers next to me on my right .
#text=I was able to fold back my seat a little bit to allow for myself to rest my head and back from a rather long drive .
#text=I pulled out my book and started reading as the plane took off .
#text=About ten minutes into the flight , I decided taking a little nap would be appropriate and helpful during the five-hour-long flight .
#text=I fell asleep for about an hour and continued to read my book .
#text=After my eyes got tired of reading , I pulled on the headphones and watching the movie being shown in front of all the passengers .
#text=The movie ended moments before we started landing , where I would then grab my belongings and head off the plane .
